sentences.sContent: When I was a student at Cambridge I remember an anthropology professor holding up a picture of a bone with 28 incisions carved in it.
sentences.sContent_eng: When I was a student at Cambridge I remember an anthropology professor holding up a picture of a bone with 28 incisions carved in it.
sentences.sCn: 当我还在剑桥读书的时候，我记得有一位人类学的教授拿出一张照片，上面是一根有28个切口的骨头。

sentences.sContent: Archaeoastronomy is the anthropology of astronomy, to distinguish it from the history of astronomy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Archaeoastronomy is the anthropology of astronomy, to distinguish it from the history of astronomy.
sentences.sCn: 考古天文学是天文学的人类学，从天文学历史来区分它。

phrases.pCn: 人类体格学；身体人类学
进化人类学；演化的人类学

remMethod.val: anthrop(人) + ology(…学) → 研究人的学科 → 人类学

words.tran: 人为的；[人类] 人类起源的
以人类为中心的；以人类观点解释宇宙万物的
类人猿的；类人的；（猿等）似人类的
人类起源学的；人类起源的
人类本位说；人类中心说

trans.tranOther: the scientific study of people, their societies,  culture s  etc
